title: Crystal Palace eye West Brom's 19-year-old full-back Nathan Ferguson
text:
Crystal Palace have identified West Brom's rising starlet Nathan Ferguson as a candidate to replace Aaron Wan-Bissaka.

Palace sold Wan-Bissaka to Manchester United for £50million in July and the summer window closed without the Eagles signing a new right back.

They plan to rectify that in January and versatile Hawthorns teenager Ferguson has caught their eye.

Nathan Ferguson has excelled for both West Brom and also England's Under 20 side

The England Under 20 international has burst onto the scene this season this season since new manager Slaven Bilic took a shine to him following his arrival.

The 19-year-old has impressed in both full-back positions this season.

He has been converted from a centre back, and has failed to start just one of the Championship leaders' league games so far this season.
description: Crystal Palace have identified West Brom's rising starlet Nathan Ferguson as a candidate to replace Aaron Wan-Bissaka.
